column2:
It is the time to get ready for Christmas Eve!
Get ready to kill all the enemies and zombiies and save your Santa shooter!
Thank you so much for being with us. Your help and support allow us to continue developing and create new games! 


Features:
Kill all enemies
Shoot it
Fun and Enjoy
Easy Mode
Happy Holidays
Amazing HD Graphics
Save Santa
Kill Zombiie
Intersting GamePlay
No Hiden Charges
No adds
For all ages

Take out all the planes before they reach the end of the screen. Shoot the candy canes & take those enemy fighters down!
